Testing VPMULHW instruction
==========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Operand A: 1000 -2000 3000 -4000 5000 -6000 7000 -8000 
Operand B: -1500 2500 -3500 4500 -5500 6500 -7500 8500 
Result: -23 -77 -161 -275 -420 -596 -802 -1038 
Expected: -23 -77 -161 -275 -420 -596 -802 -1038 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit boundary values
Operand A: 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 
Operand B: -32768 32767 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 32767 -32768 
Result: -16384 -16384 16383 16384 -16384 -16384 16383 16384 
Expected: -16384 -16384 16383 16384 -16384 -16384 16383 16384 
[PASS]

Test 3: 128-bit memory operand
Operand A (register): 5000 -6000 7000 -8000 9000 -10000 11000 -12000 
Operand B (memory): -4000 6500 -7500 8500 -9500 10500 -11500 12500 
Result: -306 -596 -802 -1038 -1305 -1603 -1931 -2289 
Expected: -306 -596 -802 -1038 -1305 -1603 -1931 -2289 
[PASS]

Test 4: 256-bit AVX operation
Operand A: 1000 -2000 3000 -4000 5000 -6000 7000 -8000 9000 -10000 11000 -12000 13000 -14000 15000 -16000 
Operand B: 500 -1000 -1500 2000 -2500 -3000 3500 -4000 -4500 5000 -5500 -6000 6500 -7000 -7500 8000 
Result: 7 30 -69 -123 -191 274 373 488 -618 -763 -924 1098 1289 1495 -1717 -1954 
Expected: 7 30 -69 -123 -191 274 373 488 -618 -763 -924 1098 1289 1495 -1717 -1954 
[PASS]

VPMULHW tests PASSED
